title: 2016 Election Russian Social Media Shock Therapy Implementation
description: Analyze the full deployment of disaster capitalism psychological manipulation techniques through social media platforms at population scale
source_document: The Capture Cascade - Part 3: The Weaponization.pdf
research_notes: Generated from systematic analysis of Putin's weaponization of American institutional capture techniques. Focus on specific dates, personnel connections, and methodological innovations that improved upon American models.
research_areas: Application of shock therapy principles: disorientation through contradictory information
Exploitation of existing traumas and fears through targeted psychological profiling
Implementation of rapid changes while populations too confused to respond effectively
Use of American social media platforms for population-scale shock therapy techniques
Creation of artificial crises to shape electoral outcomes using disaster capitalism methods
